sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './BonusBridgeExplanation.css'; /** * Component that provides concise explanation of the Bonus Bridge scoring system * Mobile-optimized version with categorized tabbed sections * @param {Object} props - Component props * @param {Function} props.onClose - Function to close the explanation */ const BonusBridgeExplanation = ({ onClose }) => { // State to track which tab is active const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('core'); // Function to handle tab changes const handleTabChange = (tab) => { setActiveTab(tab); }; return (

Bonus Bridge Scoring Explained

{/* Tab navigation */}
{/* Core Principles Tab */} {activeTab === 'core' && (

Core Principles

  • Balance gameplay between declarers and defenders
  • Reward good defense even when contracts are made
  • Scale scores to more manageable numbers
  • Consider HCP distribution between the teams
  • Reward skill rather than just card distribution

Game Contract Definitions

  • 3NT
  • 4♥/♠
  • 5♣/♦
  • Any slam (6 or 7 level)

Expected HCP by Contract

Contract Type Expected HCP
Part Scores (1-2 level) 21 HCP
3NT Game 25 HCP
4♥/♠ Game 24 HCP
5♣/♦ Game 27 HCP
Small Slams (6 level) 30 HCP
Grand Slams (7 level) 32 HCP
)} {/* Made Contracts Tab */} {activeTab === 'made' && (

Made Contract Scoring (Summary)

  1. Raw Score ÷ 20: Standard bridge score divided by 20
  2. HCP Adjustment: Based on expected HCP for contract type
  3. Performance Assessment: Rewards overtricks
  4. Contract Type Bonuses: Game (+2), Slam (+4/+6), NT (+1)
  5. Distribution Adjustment: -1 to -3 points for distributional hands
  6. Defender Reward: Calculated when defenders prevent declarer from making expected tricks

Contract Categories:

  • Made Part Score: Contracts below game level
  • Made Game with Strong Hand: Having more HCP than expected
  • Made Game with Weak Hand: Having less HCP than expected
  • Made Game with Overtricks: Extra points for overtricks
  • Made Slam: Higher bonuses for slams
)} {/* Defeated Contracts Tab */} {activeTab === 'defeated' && (

Defeated Contract Scoring (Summary)

  1. Base Penalty: Raw score ÷ 10
  2. Contract Level Penalties: Game (+3), Small Slam (+5), Grand Slam (+7)
  3. Defender Performance Bonus: For defeating contracts by 2+ tricks
  4. Declarer Consolation: Points for weak hands attempting ambitious contracts

Defeat Categories:

  • Failed Part Score: Standard penalties
  • Failed Game Contract: Higher penalties
  • Failed Slam: Highest penalties
  • Down Multiple Tricks: Extra penalties for multiple undertricks

Minimum defender score for defeated contracts: 3 points

)}
); }; export default BonusBridgeExplanation;
